messages.message: Invalid sample channelType for colorModel for KHR_texture_basisu compatibility.
messages.details: DFD block #1 colorModel is KHR_DF_MODEL_ETC1S but sample #1 channelType is KHR_DF_CHANNEL_ETC1S_AAA while KHR_texture_basisu requires KHR_DF_CHANNEL_ETC1S_GGG when sample #0 channelType is KHR_DF_CHANNEL_ETC1S_RRR.
